title: This Beautiful Lady Boss And Her Cherry Boy Employee Ended Up In The Hotel Room During Their Business Trip Together... When She Playfully Started Luring Him To Temptation,
overview: Moe and his subordinate Hashimoto, a female director who went on a business trip to a local area for business talks. Upon arriving at the hotel where she was staying that day, she had booked a shared room for men and women due to a mistake by her subordinates. It turns out that Hashimoto is a virgin when talking while drinking alcohol in the room. Moe is amused and makes a gesture to show her crotch ... Hashimoto pushes down her longing boss and begs for sex! Hashimoto, who has been delusional after seeing her AV, has sexual intercourse until the morning with a hard piston that is left to herself.
